name: Amor Fati Stoic Wisdom
shortDescription: A personal development application based on Stoic philosophy.
description: A personal development application based on Stoic philosophy. It utilizes an interactive roulette mechanism to deliver daily quotes and wisdom from authors like Marcus Aurelius. The app features a gamified habit-building system with daily streaks and rank progression. It operates on a Freemium model, storing all user progress locally on the device to ensure privacy, without requiring user registration. The service may include advertisements and optional in-app purchases.
